title: Ordering Breakfast at a Cafe
introduction: This lesson revolves around a dialogue in which an individual orders breakfast at a café, covering common phrases used when ordering food and drinks.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Buenos días, ¿me puede dar el menú de desayuno, por favor?
story.translation: Good morning, can you give me the breakfast menu, please?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Por supuesto, aquí tiene. ¿Desea algo para beber?
story.translation: Of course, here you go. Would you like something to drink?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Sí, quisiera un café con leche y un vaso de agua, gracias.
story.translation: Yes, I would like a coffee with milk and a glass of water, thank you.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Muy bien, ¿y qué le gustaría de comer?
story.translation: Very well, and what would you like to eat?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Estoy entre el pan con tomate y el desayuno americano. ¿Cuál me recomienda?
story.translation: I'm torn between the bread with tomato and the American breakfast. Which do you recommend?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Ambos son muy buenos, pero el desayuno americano es el más popular.
story.translation: Both are very good, but the American breakfast is the most popular.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Entonces tomaré el desayuno americano, por favor.
story.translation: Then I'll have the American breakfast, please.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.translation: Excellent choice. How would you like your eggs?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Revueltos, por favor. Y también, ¿podría traerme un poco de mermelada para el pan?
story.translation: Scrambled, please. And also, could you bring me some jam for the bread?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Por supuesto, enseguida le traigo su desayuno.
story.translation: Of course, I'll bring your breakfast right away.

tests.answer: How would you like your eggs?
